description:
With Taiki unconscious from exhaustion, Zenjirou leads the counterattack against the Bagra Army in his place. Meanwhile Bastemon keeps a constant watch over Taiki, leaving Akari feeling a bit like a third wheel. A dejected Akari is then lured by a vision of her mother in a mirror, which turns out to be the magic of Lilithmon telling Akari she`ll help her return to the human world in exchange for the Lake Zone`s Code Crown. As Akari searches for the Code Crown, Lilithmon awakens a secret weapon to launch her ultimate attack on the castle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: クロスハート, 燃える!
